note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Disease burden rates from cancers
subtitle:
Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs) per 100,000 individuals from all cancer types. 
DALYs measure the total burden of disease â€“ both from years of life lost due to premature death and years lived with a disability. One DALY equals one lost year of healthy life.
